interlinear-text.item: Blaser, Magdalena "Myths of the Cofán people"

word.item: At the beginning, God created land.
Realment Dios primero creó la tierra.
After creating land, He then created man.
He blew and threw the land and it rose to become a person.
Having created man, He ordered the curassow to bring him flint in order to make man teeth.
Habiendo creado al hombre mandó a Paujil: "Tráigame un pedernal para hacerle los dientes."
